Package uk.ac.aber.cs21120.knockout.solution

Class Group

java.lang.Object
uk.ac.aber.cs21120.knockout.solution.Group
All Implemented Interfaces:
IGroup
public class Group extends Object implements IGroup
This is the Group class Represents a group of teams in the tournament Implements the IGroup interface
Version:
3.0, 2nd November 2023
Author:
Ethan Swain

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Group(ITeam[] teams)
    Constructor Takes array of 'ITeam' objects as a parameter and initialises the 'teams' and 'matches' lists Calls the 'generateMatches()' method to create all possible matches between teams

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    IGroupMatch
    getNextMatch()
    Returns the next match that has not been played yet Iterates through the list of matches and checks whether each match has been played If a match has not been played, it's returned, otherwise it continues until an unplayed match is found
    int
    getPoints(ITeam team)
    Calculates the total points earned by a team Iterates through matches and checks if each match has been played If a match has been played, it determines which team won the match and adds the points to the total points of the team
    ITeam[]
    getTable()
    Returns array of teams sorted based on their points in the group Uses sort method to sort in descending order Sorted teams then returned as array

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
